title: Effective Agile Software Development
subtitle: Practical agility masterclass for developers and delivery teams.
keywords: agile training, scrum training, agile training for developers, scrum training for engineers
metaDescription: During this 2-day workshop, you will master essential Agile practices that will help you better understand, manage, and accelerate your software development process. At the end of the course, you’ll have a firm understanding of Agile values and principles, how Scrum, Lean, Kanban, Continuous Delivery, DevOps, eXtreme Programming, and Software Craftsmanship practices fit together, and how to apply and adapt them to your specific environment.
